law.catch_line: Records of transactions of reinsurance intermediary brokers.

text.section: The insurer shall have access to and the right to copy and audit all accounts and records maintained by the reinsurance intermediary broker related to its business in a form usable by the insurer.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 4, effective July 14, 1992.
